name: Bug Hunter
description:
My first game for a Game Jam YEY!.

The game is about those who hunt bugs or exploits in software to get a bounty paid by the developer.
In order to start a game you need to click the pc monitor, then you get a screen with 2 options of missions, click on the one you want to play.

Thanks to my cousin for helping me with the pixel art and animation.

Contact:
wal.gs@hotmail.com

Eligible for grand price.
